__TOC__

* Several d-i components were modified to better accommodate loop installations.
* A first cut of UbuntuSpec:ubiquity-preserve-home was committed and uploaded.
* Several bugs were fixed in Ubiquity and the Mythbuntu portions of Ubiquity.
* Work to replace the timezone widget with a cairo-based scrolling map (UbuntuSpec:hardy-ubiquity-usability) and run the UI portions of Ubiquity as a regular user is ongoing.
